text: She had dreaded still more that he might return to England, overshadowing her again with spiritual and social peril. But this kind of return was what she could never have foreseen... that he should come back not voluble but silent, not beautiful but defaced, not in obloquy but with his praises ringing! She could remember now his exciting laughter, his almost filial love for her, her almost maternal love for him.
